text: "Just the Two of Us" is a 1981 song by Grover Washington Jr. featuring Bill Withers. It was taken from his album Winelight. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 10 in Canada, number 24 in New Zealand and number 34 in the United Kingdom. It won a Grammy Award in 1982. It was covered by Will Smith in 1998. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs Category:Bill Withers songs Category:Will Smith songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs
title: Just the Two of Us (Grover Washington Jr. song)
